title: The Love Easter Egg
shortDescription: Python has a hidden love message you can discover!
detailedDescription: Python contains a sweet easter egg related to love. When you import the 'love' module or use certain love-related expressions, Python responds with heartwarming messages. This shows the Python community's emphasis on positivity and human connection, even in programming.
examples: # (This might not work in all Python versions)
# The Zen includes: 'Beautiful is better than ugly'
# Which is about loving beautiful code
# Python's philosophy is about loving what you do:
print('Come for the language, stay for the community! üêç‚ù§Ô∏è')
